name: Raven's Peak
description:
You are Crowley, a young crow. Your wife Judith is too weak to take care of your eggs. To survive, you must collect 50 flies (maybe 100...) and bring them back to the nest.

Features : 

- 3 levels (+1 bonus)

- An original hitbox ( a reversed "L") that allows climbing.

- Multiples endings

- Fliiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiies \o/

-----

Controls :

Arrow Key Left : Left

Arrow Key Right : Right

Arrow Key Up : Jump

Spacebar : Talk to Judith

K : "Couuuuuuuac"

ESC : Return to Menu

> Important : Visit the "How To Play" menu for more informations.

---------

Hello, this is my first tiny projet on Construct 2 (≈30-35h of works but you can achieve it in 10-15min max).

 I learned basics but i need to work my code & graphic arts. All comments are welcome  ! Couuuuuuuuuac ! :3
